issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.summary: NPE for a multiple inner join query

comments.body:
Attached patch, which adds a null check in the offensive code, seems makes "explain query" pass. The explain query will trigger the NPE w/o the patch.

However harmless, I'm not sure whether this is the only problem or the fix is the best. Your feedback is greatly welcome.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12748499/HIVE-11433.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 4 failed/errored test(s), 9319 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}

org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.txn.TestCompactionTxnHandler.testRevokeTimedOutWorkers
org.apache.hive.jdbc.TestSSL.testSSLConnectionWithProperty
{noformat}

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12748499 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

While the patch doesn't seem to be fixing the root of the problem, it's safe, harmless, and more importantly fix the issue. Thus, I'm going to commit this as a "temporary" solution. However, a "right" fix is greatly welcome and appreciated.
Patch committed to master and branch-1. Thanks to Chao for the review.
[~xuefuz] Do you have a repro case for the problem? I'm doing some tests for multiple joins. Thanks.
